Posts.Content: Aug 10, 2008 08:04PM joannd wrote: Namebrandwigs.com has the best prices.  I got 2 Rene of Paris wigs for $69 ea.  (Baily and Shannon) in an awsome maple sugar highlighted color.  Moccachino is also a great color.  EVERYONE loves them and could not tell they were not real.  The highlights are great!  They look better than my hair ever did. Losing my hair was the worst part of chemo but these wigs made it MUCH easier for me.
Posts.Title: Share the details of your wig with me? Drea angie27
